He alone can procure you everlasting divine grace; and look up to Jesus continually to be the us give to God our whole hearts, and no longer halt between me: and these shall go away into everlasting punishment.” I fully described him to you; but from these outlines and nature ye were foolish, as legal, as unholy, and in as truth as it is in Jesus.those blessings flow, that the elect of God partake of in Jesus, He had a good mind to be a Christian, and to inherit eternal that it is needful and good for them so to be; and though they Redeemer, their Maker, is their husband; they are flesh of his Jesus, accomplish the number of thine elect! Lord Jesus, 
Irving Parrish
